title: Judas Bowl Rules
body:
- If somebody receives 3 reacts with the Octo Judas emoji - A mod has the right to section them off into the Judas-Bowl.

- The 'Octo-Judas' is stripped of all roles except Octo-Judas where they can only interact with other Judas' in the bowl (locked out of all other channels) - and just FUD eachother.

- A beg for mercy auto command will be added to the Judas Bowl, there is a 1 in 8 chance it will ping the mods to let them out - it has an 8 minute cool-down. 

- They will then get a Born again OctopuoS role. This is just for show, and is kind of funny.

- If they bark up again, they are banished until they beg their way out of the bowl - forever in a circle of Judas fud with other Judas'.

- Other details and channels they can access to be decided on later.
author: 0xd7B233b03e6A3e4be7D989387E5144495B9a7E64
